q1: I have not been a fan of France ever since they played Italy in the world cup.
a1: Yeah France has not had a great run.
q2: Why do you say that especially given their recent world cup win?
a2: I must have been thinking about another squad.
q3: Who did France play against in their most recent world cup win?
q4: Do you think France is heading towards a golden age of football?
a4: Yes, since winning 20 years ago, they're bringing back the glory
q5: Dis France ever play against Belgium in the playoffs?
a5: Did you know that France's team consists mostly of immigrants?
